detailed_feedback.feedback: Achieved a peak front elbow angle of 179 degrees. Aim for 120-150 degrees for a full extension.
Your head was positioned correctly over your front knee for 68% of the shot. Try to keep your head leaning forward and steady over your knee to maintain balance and power.
Your average spine lean was 137 degrees. A slight forward lean (around 75-85 degrees) is ideal. Avoid falling away or being too upright; a stable base is key.
Footwork analysis requires more specific metrics (like foot angle). As a general tip, ensure a stable base with your front foot pointing towards the cover region.
